name: StandardController

constructors.name: StandardController
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the ApexPages.StandardController class for the specified standard or custom object.

methods.name: addFields
methods.description: When a Visualforce page is loaded, the fields accessible to the page are based on the fields referenced in the Visualforce markup. This method adds a reference to each field specified in fieldNames so that the controller can explicitly access those fields as well.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Returns the PageReference of the cancel page.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes record and returns the PageReference of the delete page.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Returns the PageReference of the standard edit page.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the record that is currently in context, based on the value of the id query string parameter in the Visualforce page URL.

methods.name: getRecord
methods.description: Returns the record that is currently in context, based on the value of the id query string parameter in the Visualforce page URL.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Forces the controller to reacquire access to newly referenced fields. Any changes made to the record prior to this method call are discarded.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves changes and returns the updated PageReference.

methods.name: view
methods.description: Returns the PageReference object of the standard detail page.

description: Use a StandardController when defining an extension for a standard controller.
